sentence.text: Mabry syndrome, hyperphosphatasia mental retardation syndrome (HPMRS), is an autosomal recessive disease characterized by increased serum levels of alkaline phosphatase (asparagine catabolic process via L-aspartate), severe developmental delay, intellectual disability, and seizures.

We performed whole-exome sequencing of a patient with severe intellectual disability, distinctive facial appearance, fragile nails, and persistent increased serum levels of asparagine catabolic process via L-aspartate.
